Class EntityValidator

java.lang.Object
validators.EntityValidator
public class EntityValidator extends Object
Provides validation methods for various entities within the system.

This class includes validation mechanisms for entities such as Question, Answer, PrivateMessage, Message, Review, and ReviewerRequest. It ensures required fields are present and valid according to specified criteria.

Author:
Dhruv

  • Method Details

    • validateQuestion

      public static void validateQuestion(Question question) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates a Question object.
      Parameters:
      question - The Question object to validate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the question is null, lacks a valid userId, or fails validation for title or content length.

    • validateAnswer

      public static void validateAnswer(Answer answer) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Validates an Answer object.
      Parameters:
      answer - The Answer object to validate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the answer is null, lacks a valid userId, references both a question and an answer, references neither, or has invalid content length.

    • validateLength

      private static void validateLength(String value, int min, int max, String message)
      Validates the length of a provided string.
      Parameters:
      value - The string to validate.
      min - The minimum acceptable length.
      max - The maximum acceptable length.
      message - The error message to be thrown if validation fails.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string is null or its length is outside the specified bounds.

    • validatePrivateMessage

      public static void validatePrivateMessage(PrivateMessage privateMessage)
      Validates a PrivateMessage object.
      Parameters:
      privateMessage - The PrivateMessage object to validate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the privateMessage is null, lacks a valid userId, references both a question and another message, references neither, or has invalid content length.

    • validateMessage

      public static void validateMessage(Message message)
      Validates a Message object.
      Parameters:
      message - The Message object to validate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the message is null, lacks a valid userId, or has invalid content.

    • validateMessageContent

      public static void validateMessageContent(String content)
      Validates the content of a message.
      Parameters:
      content - The content string to validate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the content is null or empty.

    • validateReview

      public static void validateReview(Review review)
      Validates a Review object.
      Parameters:
      review - The Review object to validate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the review is null, lacks a valid reviewer or user, has an invalid rating, or if the reviewer does not have the REVIEWER role.

    • validateReviewerRequest

      public static void validateReviewerRequest(ReviewerRequest request)
      Validates a ReviewerRequest object.
      Parameters:
      request - The ReviewerRequest object to validate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the request is null, the requester is invalid, or if the instructor is invalid or lacks the INSTRUCTOR role.
